title: Velo’s Predictions for 2024: The Year Cycling’s Record Books will be Rewritten
content:
In this latest installment of Velo's predictions for 2024, European editor Andrew Hood looks into cycling's crystal ball for sweeps, doubles, triples, and other new historic markers.

Read the full article at Velo’s Predictions for 2024: The Year Cycling’s Record Books will be Rewritten on Velo.
author: ahood
